thread.section_title: The French Quarters Guest Apartments - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Cute hotel, good location
thread.title_full: Cute hotel, good location - Review of The French Quarters Guest Apartments, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Natashaeva
title: Cute hotel, good location
text:
We had a great stay here during our week long holiday in New York. The bedroom was clean and comfy with a nice modern bathroom. We would have liked more cupboard/ wardrobe space. A few nights were a bit noisy with sounds of music and people from a bar but nothing too awful. We came in the freezing winter and the hotel was always warm.
Breakfast was basic and self-served but was perfect for us.
The staff were very friendly and helpful.
A nice touch was the daily newspaper and the hotel's own overview of the weather and things to do each day in the city, delivered to the room each morning.
